attributes.name: EarthArXiv
attributes.description: EarthArXiv.org is now hosted by the California Digital Library (CDL). The EarthArXiv.org URL now redirects to the CDL Janeway platform. All article DOIs will redirect to CDL and we encourage users to check the EarthArXiv CDL Janeway system for potential new versions of manuscripts.

attributes.name: INA-Rxiv
attributes.description:
With a heavy heart, we close the INArxiv service starting October 7, 2020. Thank you for your participation and support as users until now. You are supporters of the openness of science in Indonesia. We also thank COS for its continuous support for the development of open science in Indonesia.

For your next preprint document, we recommend uploading it to RINarxiv. We have explained it in more detail in the following podcast
Become open or fall behind, Dasapta Erwin Irawan (on behalf of Indonesia Open Science Team)

attributes.name: LawArXiv
attributes.description:
Legal Scholarship in the Open
LawArXiv is no longer able to accept new submissions. Thank you to everyone who contributed their work to this repository. Existing content in LawArXiv will remain accessible as part of our ongoing commitment to providing open access to legal scholarship. We appreciate your interest in this project. If you have any questions, please contact us at lawarxiv@cornell.edu

attributes.name: Research AZ
attributes.description: Explore the latest research being performed in Arizona's best learning institutions
attributes.advisory_board:
About

Research Arizona is a tri-university collaboration by the three public universities in Arizona: Arizona State University, Northern Arizona University and the University of Arizona. This collaborative effort is funded by the Arizona Board of Regents and is intended to present research data, scholarly output and information about the leading edge research being conducted in our state universities.

This collaborative effort is funded by the Arizona Board of Regents' Technology and Research Initiative Fund (TRIF).

attributes.name: SportRxiv
attributes.description:
The open access subject repository for Sport, Exercise, Performance, and Health research.

SportRxiv is no longer accepting submissions as of 8/27/2021, and all new submissions can be posted to the new platform SportRxiv OPS (sportrxiv.org). Existing preprint authors can opt-in to move their preprint to the new platform by emailing support@osf.io by September 3, 2021. For questions regarding SportRxiv and STORK email aaron@storkinesiology.org.
